title: Antigravity vs Gamma AI: Which AI Tool is Better in 2025?
metaDescription: Compare Antigravity vs Gamma AI. See pricing, features, pros & cons to choose the best AI tool for your needs in 2025.
introduction: Choosing between Antigravity and Gamma AI? These AI tools serve different but sometimes overlapping purposes, each with unique strengths. This comparison breaks down the key differences to help you decide.

sections.title: Overview: Antigravity vs Gamma AI
paragraphs: Antigravity (developer tools) is Antigravity is a revolutionary multi-agent AI code editor that debuted at #1 in December 2025 developer rankings. Completely free during preview, it features unique multi-agent orchestration where multiple AI agents collaborate on complex coding tasks, integrated Chrome browser automation for testing, and support for the latest models (Gemini 3 Pro, Claude Sonnet 4.5/Opus 4.5). Its key differentiator is multi-agent collaboration—a capability no competitor offers—enabling it to tackle complex projects autonomously.. It's known for code-editor, ai-agents, multi-agent.

Gamma AI (productivity) is Gamma is an AI-powered presentation platform that creates professional slides, documents, and webpages from simple text prompts or outlines. Launched in 2023 and achieving a $2.1B valuation in November 2025, it uses AI to handle design, formatting, and visual layouts automatically. Its unique value lies in eliminating manual slide design work while maintaining professional quality and brand consistency.. Users choose it for presentations, slides, ai-design.

sections.title: Key Features
paragraphs: Antigravity: Multi-agent orchestration (unique feature), Integrated Chrome browser automation, Live preview and design-to-code
Gamma AI: AI-generated presentations from text prompts, One-click theme and layout customization, Built-in templates for various use cases

verdict: Both Antigravity and Gamma AI are excellent AI tools. Your choice depends on specific needs: Antigravity for code-editor, Gamma AI for presentations.
